associatedFileExtension._instruction: Enter one or several file extensions associated with this content type.

description._instruction: Enter a description of the content type specification if no public specification file can be linked. Leave blank an d use 'specification' if a public specification can be linked.

relatedMediaType._instruction: Enter the iternationalized resource identifier (IRI) to a registered media type (e.g. on IANA.org) matching this content type.

name._instruction: Enter the name (iana-inspired convention) of this content type.

specification._instruction: Enter the iternationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the official specification of this content type. Leave blank and use 'description' to provide some specification if an official specification is not available.

synonym._instruction: Enter one or several synonyms of this content type.
